# ITLibraryDidChange

**Type Property**

A notification the system posts when a library change occurs.

## Declaration

```swift
static let ITLibraryDidChange: NSNotification.Name
```

## Discussion

Call [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/iTunesLibrary/ITLibrary/reloadData()] to retrieve a new view of the library contents.
title: ITLibraryDidChange
